pageContent:
CSC317-Section 01  Daniel | Jayden | Julian | Kunj 
1 
  
 
Group Project demo 2 
 
Description: 
For this part, Jayden and Daniel, our frontend devs worked on creating a simple looking website 
that basically has 2-3 another pages. On the landing page we have a simple looking chat picture, 
with the name RAGBot on top left corner and Login/register part on the top right corner, and that 
is where you can start using our website. Below that, we have About us section for the the 
obvious thing, about us and about the website.  
Right below that, we have FaQs as well as support form link to go and have some questions 
answered. 
Approach / What I Did: 
We used the classic Telegraf fonts with simplistic design using HTML, CSS and some 
responsive components with Javascript. We had dark blue color in the background and we had 
lighter contrasts over it for the components. We went over step by step, and doing meeting calls 
almost every 2 days to check the updates.

lighter contrasts over it for the components. We went over step by step, and doing meeting calls 
almost every 2 days to check the updates. 
Issues and Resolutions: 
Apparently, there was a classic issue of centering the divs on the page which was cleared after 
few struggles. After that, we were having issues with not having proper color contrasts as well as 
site looking pretty messy which we made simple after removing a ton of stuff to make it user 
friendly and straightforward. And In case they need any guidance, they can always reach out for 
help using contact us section or the support form.

CSC317-Section 01  Daniel | Jayden | Julian | Kunj 
2 
  
Analysis:  
Though we need to work on the frontend and A LOTS of backend, we did a good job. We will be 
working a lot on backend now and hopefully, we are looking forward to have issues clear soon.
